alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Washington County through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Prairie Grove, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... West Fork... Lincoln... Greenland... Drake Field Airport... Prairie Grove Battlefield State... Walnut Grove... Savoy... Clyde... Wedington... Rhea... Canehill... Hogeye... Morrow... Wheeler... Viney Grove... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 53 and 64. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
